name: Shadeslayer (demo)
description:
A game about exploring a sprawling world full of mysteries and secrets, discover the truth about the player character's tragic past and save the kingdom. Keep in mind that this is a demo and not a finished game. Please leave feedback in the comments. Constructive criticism is very welcome.

WASD of arrow keys to move. Z, W of up to jump, S or down to travel through threaders, C or shift to attack.
